message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its exceptional quality and features, I am extending an initial offer of $750000 for the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the quality of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $650000.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and am willing to consider your counteroffer. After careful consideration, I am proposing a counteroffer of $700000 for the product. This price reflects a compromise while still ensuring a fair return for our efforts in developing and providing this high-quality item.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Given my financial situation, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $675000.

Thank you for your continued interest, Bob. I've reviewed your latest counteroffer and, considering the value of our product, I am prepared to counter with a price of $725000. This proposal aims to find a balance between our interests and ensure a satisfactory transaction for both parties.
I understand your position, Alice. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $690000.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob. After reviewing your most recent counteroffer, I am willing to counter with a price of $715000. This figure seeks to maintain a fair exchange while reflecting the value of our product.
I appreciate your effort, Alice. Based on my budget, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $695000.

Considering your latest proposal, Bob, I am willing to counter with a price of $710000 for the product. This figure aims to be fair and reflective of its value while allowing us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Based on my financial constraints, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $697500.
